name: FAVRR
description: FAVRR is a Web3 fandom trading platform built on the Base blockchain. It enables users to invest in virtual assets known as “FAVEs,” which represent cultural icons, public figures, and trending topics. Users participate in gamified events such as Initial Fan Offerings (IFOs), where they earn points, build investment-style portfolios, and trade FAVEs on-chain. The platform combines entertainment, prediction, and social engagement into a dynamic ecosystem where fandom becomes tradable value.
